column4: Im building a pc for the first time, im just about to install the processor but im not sure weather i need thermal paste on my heat sync, it's the one i got with the cpu, heres a pic http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v648/STAR3211/P8100184.jpg , is that gray stuff the termal paste thats already on it?
new processor usually already comes with thermal compound
yes, it is the thermal compund alredy installed
